title: Akali.
body:
{{champion:84}}  _**Double Kill!**_

{{champion:69}} report bot

{{champion:84}} _**Triple Kill!**_

{{champion:77}} Dammit, how many lives have you taken to get these 25 Mejai's stacks?!

{{champion:84}} I don't know, how many minions have you farmed in your life?

{{champion:77}} *gasp*

{{champion:86}} **AKAAAAAALIIII!**

{{champion:77}} It's not use, she's hiding in her dank vape clouds again!

{{champion:86}} Good thing I brought this red ward with me, then!

{{champion:77}} She's over there, hit her!

{{champion:86}} I.. I can't..

{{champion:77}} What do you mean you can't?!

{{champion:86}} New control wards, we can only see her but we can't target her.

{{champion:77}} But that doesn't make any sense!

{{champion:86}} I know.

{{champion:84}} _**Quadra Kill!**_

{{champion:77}} y-you fool, you can't outdamage my lifesteal!

{{item:3165}} {{champion:84}} _**Penta Kill!**_
